  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera​(Point3D o, Vector to, Vector up)
      Ctor
      Parameters:
      o - point 3D locate the head of all orientation camera vectors
      up - vUp
      to - vTo

  • Method Details

    • getP0

      public Point3D getP0()
      Returns:
      point of camera view

      public Vector getvRight()
      Returns:
      vector orientation of camera

    • getvTo

      public Vector getvTo()
      Returns:
      vector direct forward from camera

    • getvUp

      public Vector getvUp()
      Returns:
      vector orthogonal to vTo & vRight

    • constructRayThroughPixel

      public Ray constructRayThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i, double screenDistance, double screenWidth, double screenHeight)
      Parameters:
      nX - pixels per W
      nY - pixels per H
      j - location of ray trough pixel
      i - location of ray trough pixel
      screenDistance - distance between camera to view plane
      screenWidth - screen width size
      screenHeight - screen height size
      Returns:
      specific Ray from camera toward view plane
